Text:
Thanks so much for this upload....
Just a question..... How do I make it to work on Capture NX?

Hi there , if you dont know much plz refer to official website

Greetingz

DeGun... Thank you for your quick reply....
What happen is every time I open Color FX to install, It tells me that the app will be installed on Aperture or Lightroom but it doesn't show me Capture NX2 at all. I use Capture to prcces my RAW files and not Aperture nor Lightroom....
Thanks!

DeGun.... Thank you for the upload and your quick reply....
The only problem I have is that when I try to install Color Efex it tells me it will be installed on Lightroom and Aperture BUT I don't find the way to install it on NikonCapture NX2. I only use capture to work on my RAW files....
Anyway, I hope you can help me and thanks again! Cheers!

check this out plz : 

http://nikonasia-en.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/6444/related/1/~/installing-nik-software-color-efex-pro-3.0-%28for-capture-nx-2%29-%E2%80%93-windows

... run NX2 , open an image that you want to edit , roll your mouse over the "Filters" menu in NX2 to display the Color Efex Pro 3.0 Traditional or Color Efex Pro 3.0 Stylizing sub-menus ... ain't there ? let us know . 
good luck
when I try and put in the serial the "activate" button is grayed out.  is there something specific I should be putting into the first last name and company line?
It looks like the serials work for most of them, such as Dfine and sharpener but the serials don't work for me on color efex.  Any ideas?

Did you do as suggested in txt file ? :

Double Click ColorEfexPro3Complete-mac-pal-rev3.110.dmg

To Mount & Install Nik Software â€“ Color Efex Pro v3.110

follow The Onscreen Instructions By The Setup

When Finish Installing,Click Close, To Complete The Setup

## Now Start Your Compatible Photo Editing Soft, Ex.Photoshop,
Now Open Any Photo In Your Photo Editing Soft, Ex.Photoshop,
In Photoshop Go To Filters-> Nik Software->
Color Efex Pro 3.0 Complete, Wait A Sec, Now The Program Starts,
### You Will Be Ask To Provide A User Name And [ Product Key ]. 
Use The Info Provided Below, To Register The Program ### 


Serial:

1711-38780-dkciinio-adodcnba

1711-71517-ohddeoid-ilhplmkb

Nik Color Efex Pro3 Complete for Lightroom SN#:

071122936KFCWGGMLXJJDLSPP

Let us know hows thingz

@DeGun thanks for this upload. Great!
 @ everyone with questions... Buy the program if you want support. Lol..
+1 for all serials working EXCEPT with Color Efex Pro.
+1 for all serials working EXCEPT with Color Efex Prox
Found another serial for Color Efex Pro elsewhere (worked), which turned out to be the same as the one specified in the instructions as being for Lightroom.  So use that one for Photoshop!

Hi DeGun,

NIK_SOFTWARE_PACK__Mac_Osx__Medicine_-_A.D_Cool_-_DeGun.6368725.TPB.torrent

So can you please forgive my ignorance and tell me how to do it?
